bibl.title: A Visual Journey through Egypt's Frontier Oasis. Photographs by Ken Garrett.
bibl.note: First results of the North Kharga Oasis Survey (NKOS), of which the author is co-director. Presents several Roman forts in good state of preservation.
bibl.seg: Ikram Salima, A Visual Journey through Egypt's Frontier Oasis. Photographs by Ken Garrett.
First results of the North Kharga Oasis Survey (NKOS), of which the author is co-director. Presents several Roman forts in good state of preservation.
